title: 110_s961
content: Belated Thank You to the Merchant Mariners of World War II Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a monthly benefit of $1,000 to certain honorably-discharged veterans of the US Merchant Marine who served between December 7, 1941, and December 31, 1946 . Includes service in the Army Transport Service and the Naval Transport Service. Exempts from taxation benefits paid under this Act.
